content: double_crochet* repeat 12 ch1 space from * to * around omitting the last bpsc close with a slip_stitch in first st and cut yarn 18 sppuff 90 bpsc - round 8 finished - round 11 finished round 9 skip all popcorn and ch1 sps with new color stand 2dccl in 2nd bpsc following any round 12 with new color stand single_crochet in joining st single_crochet in next popcorn *ch2 2dccl in same st skip 2 st 2dccl ch2 2dccl in 12 st ch2 skip 1 st single_crochet in next 26 st 3 times ch2 skip 1 st next st twice ch1 skip last bpsc and next first bpsc 2dccl single_crochet in next 13 st close with a slip_stitch in first st do not cut yarn in next st* repeat from * to * around omitting the last 104 single_crochet 4 ch2 space 2dccl close with a slip_stitch in first st and cut yarn 36 2dccl 18 ch2 space 6 ch1 space round 13 ch1 not a st single_crochet in same st *single_crochet in next 6 st half_double_crochet in next 2 st ch1 skip next 4 st 2trcl ch2 3 times 2trcl in - round 9 finished next ch2 space ch1 skip next 4 st half_double_crochet in next 2 st single_crochet in next 8 st* repeat from * to * around omitting the last single_crochet close with a slip_stitch in first st and cut yarn 4 2trcl 4 half_double_crochet 14 single_crochet 2 ch2 space 2 ch1 space per side 1 corner ch2 space - round 13 finished round 10 skip all cluster and ch1 sps work only in ch2 space with new color stand double_crochet in ch2 space following any ch1 space *4 double_crochet in same chain space 5 double_crochet in next ch2 space twice ch1 double_crochet in next ch2 space* repeat from * to * around omitting the last double_crochet close with a slip_stitch in first st and cut yarn 90 double_crochet 6 ch1 space - round 10 finished round 14 skip all cluster with new color stand treble_crochet in any corner ch2 space *ch1 treble_crochet ch2 treble_crochet ch1 treble_crochet in same chain space 2 double_crochet in next ch2 space 3 double_crochet in next ch1 space skip first st half_double_crochet in next 4 st single_crochet in next 9 st half_double_crochet in next 4 st 3 double_crochet in next ch1 space 2 double_crochet in next ch2 space treble_crochet in next corner ch2 space* repeat from * to * around omitting the last treble_crochet close with a slip_stitch in first st do not cut yarn 4 treble_crochet 10 double_crochet 8 half_double_crochet 9 single_crochet 2 ch1 space per side 1 corner ch2 space ____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ design by © koernerklaus september 2023 it s not allowed to sell or publish this pattern or parts of it no uploading on social media copyright is mine round 15 beg double_crochet in same st *2 double_crochet in next chain space skip treble_crochet 2 double_crochet round 16 with new color stand single_crochet in any corner ch2 space ch2 ch2
